NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE REGIONAL DIRECTOR
Alabama Educational TV Commission
807 Protective Life Building
Birmingham, Alabama
June 17, 1959
Mr. William G. Harley
President
NAEB
WHA-TV
Madison, Wisconsin
Dear Bill:
Your MEMO ON CONTINENTAL CLASSROOM and your letter to Mr.
Arthur S. Adams are communocations of dignity and worth. May I
commend you again for your good judgment and intellectual honesty
in this treatment of what could be a very touchy subject.
I think you are making the best President of NAEB that we have ever
had.
With kindest regards, I am
Sincerely yours,
Raymond D. Hurlbert
RDH/ml
